com.wx.android.common.util

类 TelephonyUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wx.android.common.util.TelephonyUtils

  • public class TelephonyUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    TelePhony, Requires Permission "READ_PHONE_STATE"

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      TelephonyUtils() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static int getCallState(android.content.Context context)
      Returns a constant indicating the call state (cellular) on the device, includes CALL_STATE_IDLE, CALL_STATE_OFFHOOK, CALL_STATE_RINGING.
      static int getDataActivity(android.content.Context context)
      Returns a constant indicating the type of activity on a data connection.
      static int getDataState(android.content.Context context)
      Returns a constant indicating the current data connection state.
      static java.lang.String getIMEI(android.content.Context context)
      Returns the unique device ID, for example, the IMEI for GSM and the MEID or ESN for CDMA phones.
      static java.lang.String getIMSI(android.content.Context context)
      Returns the unique subscriber ID, for example, the IMSI for a GSM phone.
      static java.lang.String getLine1Number(android.content.Context context)
      Returns the phone number string for line 1, for example, the MSISDN for a GSM phone.
      static java.lang.String getNetworkCountryIso(android.content.Context context)
      Returns the ISO country code equivalent of the current registered operator's MCC (Mobile Country Code).
      static java.lang.String getNetworkOperator(android.content.Context context)
      Returns the numeric name (MCC+MNC) of current registered operator.
      static java.lang.String getNetworkOperatorName(android.content.Context context)
      Returns the alphabetic name of current registered operator.
      static int getNetworkType(android.content.Context context)
      Returns a constant indicating the radio technology (network type) currently in use on the device for data transmission.
      static java.lang.String getSimCountryIso(android.content.Context context)
      Returns the ISO country code equivalent for the SIM provider's country code.
      static java.lang.String getSimOperator(android.content.Context context)
      Returns the MCC+MNC (mobile country code + mobile network code) of the provider of the SIM. 5 or 6 decimal digits.
      static java.lang.String getSimOperatorName(android.content.Context context)
      Returns the Service Provider Name (SPN).
      static java.lang.String getSimSerialNumber(android.content.Context context)
      Returns the serial number of the SIM, if applicable.
      static int getSimState(android.content.Context context)
      Returns a constant indicating the state of the device SIM card.
      static boolean hasIccCard(android.content.Context context)
      Return true if a ICC card is present.
      static boolean isNetworkRoaming(android.content.Context context)
      Returns true if the device is considered roaming on the current network, for GSM purposes.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getIMEI

        public static java.lang.String getIMEI(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the unique device ID, for example, the IMEI for GSM and the MEID or ESN for CDMA phones. Return null if device ID is not available.
        参数:
        context -
        返回:

      • getLine1Number

        public static java.lang.String getLine1Number(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the phone number string for line 1, for example, the MSISDN for a GSM phone. Return null if it is unavailable.
        参数:
        context -
        返回:
